abstract: Greta Van Susteren will move to 7 p.m. from 10, making way for Sean Hannity. Megyn Kelly will host “The Kelly File” in Mr. Hannity’s old slot at 9.
snippet: Greta Van Susteren will move to 7 p.m. from 10, making way for Sean Hannity. Megyn Kelly will host “The Kelly File” in Mr. Hannity’s old slot at 9.
lead_paragraph: The Fox News Channel on Tuesday announced a new lineup of hosts for its weeknight schedule, moving Greta Van Susteren to 7 p.m. from her current spot at 10 and moving Sean Hannity into the 10 p.m. hour from his present 9 o’clock slot.

headline.main: Fox News Unveils New Prime-Time Lineup
